knimeNode.name: Radar Plot Appender
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates radar plots for each row, summarizing selected doubles in this row

fullDescription.intro: This node adds a column holding radar plots for each row. Each such plot summarizes the selected double values on this row. It also displays a selected range, which eases spotting values outside the given range. Values are drawn as a ribbon connecting the axes. The colors of the ribbon, range, and the background are fully customizable.
fullDescription.option: The color for the background of the drawn radarplots
The color of the band which shows the selected intervals
The color of the value-ribbon if all values are within the selected ranges
The color of the value-ribbon if one value is outside of the selected ranges

ports.outPort: Input with one new column attached.
